. It is a major crossroads for buses to the
border at Na Meow, but otherwise the town has little of interest.

You can get here both by bus and train from Hanoi. The city is 153 km south of Hanoi, about 3 hours. Bus tickets are 100,000-120,000 dong for a seat on air-con bus. The road is good.

You can also get in from Xam Nua (Sam Neua), Laos for 180,000 kip via the Na Meo border crossing. It takes about 10-12 hours along winding mountain roads in a small bus with padded seats. The aisle will be full of rice bags.

Best choice in every town in Vietnam to get around is "xe ôm" (moto-taxi). Negotiate price before you ride. For a trip of 5 km, pay 50,000 dong. Meter taxis are available with the same price throughout the country, call +84 37 858585 or dial 858585 if using a land line phone in town.

There are town buses you can use to get to the bus station and other areas around town.

The most touristy attraction near Thanh Hoa is Sam Son Beach. It the most beautiful beach in the north of Vietnam. The beach is crowded from Apr-Sep. In Sam Son town, a small provincial town, 16 km from Thanh Hoa. There are buses from Thanh Hoa to the town, departing every 30 minutes from the bus station.

Ben En National Park is a good destination for eco-tours. This park is 46 km southwest of Thanh Hoa. It is 16,000 hectares of mountains and jungles with many kinds of wild animals and tropical trees. There is a big lake in the park, covering 4,000 hectares containing 21 islands.
Come to Thanh hoa, you can walk around and see the city, a typical city of central Vietnam with an economy growing strong.

value: In Thanh Hoa city, you can visit some supermarkets and big markets in the area to buy souvenir, momentos...

- Big C hypermarkets
- Co-op Mart supermarket
- Thanh Hoa supermarket
- HC electronics supermarket
- Chợ Tây Thành (West Market)
- Chợ Nam Thành (South Market)
- Chợ Vườn Hoa (Flowergarden Market)
A room in the majority of hotels costs around 200,000 dong per night.

value: content=En suite double rooms with TV.
address=Đông Hương new urban zone, Thanh Hoa City
directions=Get by taxi about 5 km from the city centre
- frequent buses from the bus station or flag one down on Hwy 1.
- a good base for visiting Tam Coc or Cuc Phuong National Park. Takes just over an hour. 40,000 dong.
